name: webcharts-jqx-projectplan
description: Documents describing the project plan and process for JQX and WebCharts. Using Github to explore and refine the process.

scripts.minify: node source/build/mk-temp-dir.js && node_modules/uglify-js2/bin/uglifyjs2 source/*js -o min/example.min.js  --source-map min/example.min.js.map  --source-map-root  http://example.com/src -p 5 -c -m

author: Mark Black
